settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.content: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my orders?
settings.content: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: Any question?
settings.content: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.content: Use this text to share information about your product or shipping policies.
settings.support_hours: Our customer support is available Monday to Friday: 8am-8:30pm.

settings.text: TO UPDATE THE SPEAKERS, PLEASE DO THE FOLLOWING:

settings.content:
• Unzip the file and put the "ota.bin" file on an empty USB drive (MAX 32 GB - formatted as FAT32)*. Remember to "eject" it properly before removing it from the computer
  • Plug it into the USB port on the back of the speaker
  • Turn on the speaker and hold the mute-button for 8 seconds
  • The LED on the speaker will now start blinking to indicate it is updating
  • Once it has stopped blinking, please unplug the power cable, disconnect the USB drive and wait 5 seconds before turning on the speaker again. It's now updated!
